title: North Korea Tested Components of New ICBM in February, March Launches, U.S. Officials Say
sub_head: Missile system, if fully developed, could hit U.S. territories or allies
body:
WASHINGTONâ€”Two recent North Korean missile launches tested components of a new intercontinental missile system that if fully developed could hit the U.S. territories or allies, officials said.
The missile launches, which took place on Feb. 26and March 4, could foreshadow a North Korean test of the missile at its full intercontinental range, an official said.
